name: Teddybear's Playtime
description:
A child’s room contains many items, but only one of them seems to be a little unusual. You don’t quite know why, but you decide to take a closer look.

Relax and enjoy the art, and, while using only the left mouse button, gradually uncover the toy’s surprises through play.

The game will be udapted to add the end of the game.

 Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

Félix Belthoise (@Azathothep) – Game Design

Molham – Programming

Tom Marrec – Graphics and Animation | Instagram

Emily Winsor – Music and Sounds
